channel.title: Walk movement
channel.description: now i am not sure if this anim is server sided or client sided(i think it is client sided) but anyways.. when i walk, my character stops a tile, then walks another tile, stops, etc. and since i got to far to copy/paste then fix errors on another source, i want to know how to change walking anim to see if it is the problem. thanks!
